glyph.effect: Your Power Word: Shield also heals the target for 20% of the absorption amount.
glyph.name: Glyph of Power Word: Shield

glyph.effect: Your Levitate spell no longer requires a reagent.
glyph.name: Glyph of Levitate

glyph.effect: Receive 5% of your maximum mana if your Shadowfiend dies from damage.
glyph.name: Glyph of Shadowfiend

glyph.effect: Your Prayer of Healing spell also heals an additional 20% of its initial heal over 6 sec.
glyph.name: Glyph of Prayer of Healing

glyph.effect: Reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Fortitude spell by 50%.
glyph.name: Glyph of Fortitude

glyph.effect: Reduces the cooldown of Penance by 2 sec.
glyph.name: Glyph of Penance

glyph.effect: Your Prayer of Healing spell also heals an additional 20% of its initial heal over 6 sec.
glyph.name: Glyph of Prayer of Healing

glyph.effect: Reduces the mana cost of your Fade spell by 30%.
glyph.name: Glyph of Fading

glyph.effect: Your Levitate spell no longer requires a reagent.
glyph.name: Glyph of Levitate

glyph.effect: Reduces the cooldown of your Guardian Spirit by 30 sec.
glyph.name: Glyph of Guardian Spirit

glyph.effect: Reduces the mana cost of your Power Word: Fortitude spell by 50%.
glyph.name: Glyph of Fortitude

glyph.effect: Your Circle of Healing spell heals 1 additional target.
glyph.name: Glyph of Circle of Healing
